description: Risk Management Configuration for GridMaster 300K Prop Firm Challenge

account.notes: Conservative approach - user prefers handcuffed risk

challenge_rules.notes: Standard prop firm rules - DD limits are absolute, not relative

stop_loss.description: 1.5x ATR from entry, managed internally - not shown in broker order

take_profit.description: 3x ATR from entry (3:1 reward ratio), managed internally

partial_take_profit.description: Close 50% of position at first target (1.5x ATR profit)

trailing_stop.description: Trail at 1 ATR once break-even is set

break_even.description: Move SL to entry + buffer when price moves 50% to TP

grid_limits.description: 10 orders per expert x 3 experts = 30 max concurrent positions

risk_per_trade.description: Risk 0.15% per grid level, max 2% daily total

hidden_orders_note.why_hidden: Hidden SL/TP prevents broker stop hunting and provides flexibility
hidden_orders_note.implementation: ATR multipliers are hardcoded, actual price levels calculated dynamically per trade
hidden_orders_note.management: Virtual SL/TP checked every tick, closed by market order when hit
